document_data.title: Dark Elf Trilogy
document_data.author: [[R.A. Salvatore]]
document_data.mainbody: '''The Dark Elf Trilogy''' is the second series of books about [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] written by [[R.A. Salvatore]]. Salvatore wrote the books after finishing the [[Icewind Dale trilogy]], but in ''Realms'' chronology the Dark Elf trilogy precedes the Icewind Dale novels.

Brief Summary.The Dark Elf trilogy:
# ''[[Homeland]]'' (1990) 
# ''[[Exile]]'' (1990)
# ''[[Sojourn]]'' (1991)

: This series is also available as the [[Dark Elf Trilogy Gift Set]].
